alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 6:21AM EST until December 21 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at North Sidney. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Portions of Lithgow Street in Winslow floods. At 17.0 feet, minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
